name: The Pizza Courier
description:
Do you know the feeling when cold food is brought to you? It's not the most pleasant thing, for sure.

Here's why, the Pizza Courier comes to destroy all stereotypes about delivery people. The only solution is to start everything from yourself.
Get behind the wheel of a scooter and make hungry people happy with this service, becoming the best courier in town who delivers pizza on time and still steaming.
Our mission is to make people happy, eating the best pizza in town, as it is taken out of the oven. Do you think you are ready for such challenges?
If so, stay tuned and wait for the next order!

Game Features :
- 4 types of motorcycles(scooter,ATV and others)
- A lot of levels
- Different types of customers
- Timer for delivery
